Title: SKET Dance: SD Character Flash Anime
Description: ['The SD Character Flash Anime is a special addition to the anime series\' official website. Each "episode" features a different character, drawn in a super-deformed style, set to a song sung by the character\'s seiyuu.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Corpse Party: Blood Covered', 'Prequel: Corpse Party: Missing Footage']
